He was best known for his two books on the origins of names in rock music,The A-Z of Names in Rock by Mark Beech, Robson Books (1998), pp. 250 / on Google BooksThe Dictionary of Rock and Pop Names: The Rock and Pop Names Encyclopedia from Aaliyah to ZZ Top by Mark Beech, Remember When (2009), pp. 319 / on Google Books and for his columns about music and the arts. Beech was the editor of DANTE magazine and a fellow of the Royal Society of Arts."Back to the Future as Bands Re-form, Go Green" by Mark Beech, DANTE magazine (1 August 2013) He died in Edinburgh of heart disease on 24 April 2020, aged 60.Regional journalist who became rock music critic dies aged 60 ==References== Category:1959 births Category:1960 births Category:2020 deaths Category:English journalists Category:Music critics Category:Writers from Birmingham
